newsitem.title: USA: Agouron's Quart to head drug development.
newsitem.headline: Agouron's Quart to head drug development.

text.p: Agouron Pharmaceuticals Inc said it named Barry Quart senior vice president and head of drug development. Previously Quart had been a vice president in charge of regulatory affairs.
In his new position Quart will coordinate activities leading to registration of new drugs coming out of Agouron's pipeline.

Agouron also said that that R. Ken Snyder was named senior vice president, head of commercial affairs, having responsibility for business activity and commercialization of drugs. The company was not immediately available to say whom Quart and Snyder succeeded in their new positions.
